package JDBC_test;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.Statement;

/**
 * @author å°é»„å°é»„ä¸å†è¿·èŒ«
 * @version 1.0
 */

public class Test {
    public static void main(String args[]) {
        try {
            Class.forName("com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver");     //åŠ è½½MYSQL JDBCé©±åŠ¨ç¨‹åº
            System.out.println("Success loading Mysql Driver!");
        }
        catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.print("Error loading Mysql Driver!");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        try {
            Connection connect = DriverManager.getConnection(
                    "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/myuser","root","ä½ çš„å¯†ç ");
            //å»ºç«‹è¿æ¥ï¼ŒURLä¸ºjdbc:mysql//æœåŠ¡å™¨åœ°å€/æ•°æ®åº“myuser ï¼Œåé¢çš„2ä¸ªå‚æ•°åˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯ç™»é™†ç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç 

            System.out.println("Success connect Mysql server!");
            Statement stmt = connect.createStatement(); //åˆ›å»ºè¿è¡Œå¯¹è±¡
            ResultSet rs = stmt.executeQuery("select * from account");//æ‰§è¡ŒæŸ¥è¯¢accountè¡¨

            while (rs.next()) {
                System.out.println(rs.getString("name"));//è·å–nameåˆ—çš„å€¼ï¼ˆå­—ç¬¦ä¸²å‹ï¼‰
            }
        }
        catch (Exception e) {
            System.out.print("get data error!");
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
}

package JDBC_test2;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
import java.sql.Statement;


/**
 * @author å°é»„å°é»„ä¸å†è¿·èŒ«
 * @version 1.0
 */


public class Test2 {
    static Connection conn;
    static Statement st;

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        insert();   //æ’å…¥æ·»åŠ è®°å½•
        update();   //æ›´æ–°è®°å½•æ•°æ®
        delete();   //åˆ é™¤è®°å½•
        query();    //æŸ¥è¯¢è®°å½•å¹¶æ˜¾ç¤º
    }

    //ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰è¿æ¥çš„è·å–ï¼Œåœ¨æ“ä½œå‰å¿…é¡»å…ˆè·å–ä¸æ•°æ®åº“çš„è¿æ¥ã€‚
    private static Connection getConnection() {
        String driver = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"; //è‹¥æŠ¥é”™ä½¿ç”¨com.mysql.jdbc.Driver
        String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/myuser?serverTimezone=UTC "; //myuseræ˜¯æ•°æ®åº“åç§°
        String username = "root"; //æ•°æ®åº“ç”¨æˆ·å
        String password = "ä½ çš„å¯†ç "; //æ•°æ®åº“ç”¨æˆ·å¯†ç 
        Connection conn = null;
        try {
            Class.forName(driver); //classLoader,åŠ è½½å¯¹åº”é©±åŠ¨
            conn = (Connection) DriverManager.getConnection(url, username, password);
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return conn;
    }

    //ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰ æ’å…¥ï¼ˆinsertï¼‰æ“ä½œ
    public static void insert() {
        conn = getConnection(); // é¦–å…ˆè¦è·å–è¿æ¥ï¼Œå³è¿æ¥åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“
        try {
            String sql = "insert into account (name,password) values('lucy','123')"; // æ’å…¥æ•°æ®çš„sqlè¯­å¥
            st = (Statement) conn.createStatement();    // åˆ›å»ºç”¨äºæ‰§è¡Œé™æ€sqlè¯­å¥çš„Statementå¯¹è±¡
            int count = st.executeUpdate(sql);  // æ‰§è¡Œæ’å…¥æ“ä½œçš„sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œå¹¶è¿”å›æ’å…¥æ•°æ®çš„ä¸ªæ•°
            System.out.println("å‘accountè¡¨ä¸­æ’å…¥ " + count + " æ¡æ•°æ®"); //è¾“å‡ºæ’å…¥æ“ä½œçš„å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
            conn.close();   //å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            System.out.println("æ’å…¥æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥" + e.getMessage());
        }
    }

    //ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰ æ›´æ–°ï¼ˆupdateï¼‰æ“ä½œ
    public static void update() {
        conn = getConnection(); //åŒæ ·å…ˆè¦è·å–è¿æ¥ï¼Œå³è¿æ¥åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“
        try {
            String sql = "update account set password='0000' where name = 'å¼ ä¸‰'";// æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®çš„sqlè¯­å¥
            st = (Statement) conn.createStatement();    //åˆ›å»ºç”¨äºæ‰§è¡Œé™æ€sqlè¯­å¥çš„Statementå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œstå±å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡
            int count = st.executeUpdate(sql);// æ‰§è¡Œæ›´æ–°æ“ä½œçš„sqlè¯­å¥ï¼Œè¿”å›æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®çš„ä¸ªæ•°
            System.out.println("accountè¡¨ä¸­æ›´æ–° " + count + " æ¡æ•°æ®");      //è¾“å‡ºæ›´æ–°æ“ä½œçš„å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
            conn.close();   //å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            System.out.println("æ›´æ–°æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥");
        }
    }

    //ï¼ˆ5ï¼‰æŸ¥è¯¢ï¼ˆqueryï¼‰æ“ä½œ
    public static void query() {
        conn = getConnection(); //åŒæ ·å…ˆè¦è·å–è¿æ¥ï¼Œå³è¿æ¥åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“
        try {
            String sql = "select * from account";     // æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®çš„sqlè¯­å¥
            st = (Statement) conn.createStatement();    //åˆ›å»ºç”¨äºæ‰§è¡Œé™æ€sqlè¯­å¥çš„Statementå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œstå±å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡
            ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(sql);    //æ‰§è¡ŒsqlæŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥ï¼Œè¿”å›æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®çš„ç»“æœé›†
            System.out.println("æœ€åçš„æŸ¥è¯¢ç»“æœä¸ºï¼š");
            while (rs.next()) { // åˆ¤æ–­æ˜¯å¦è¿˜æœ‰ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°æ®
                // æ ¹æ®å­—æ®µåè·å–ç›¸åº”çš„å€¼
                String name = rs.getString("name");
                String password = rs.getString("password");
                //è¾“å‡ºæŸ¥åˆ°çš„è®°å½•çš„å„ä¸ªå­—æ®µçš„å€¼
                System.out.println(name + " " + password + " ");
            }
            conn.close();   //å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            System.out.println("æŸ¥è¯¢æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥");
        }
    }
    //ï¼ˆ6ï¼‰åˆ é™¤ï¼ˆdeleteï¼‰æ“ä½œ
        public static void delete () {
            conn = getConnection(); //åŒæ ·å…ˆè¦è·å–è¿æ¥ï¼Œå³è¿æ¥åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“
            try {
                String sql = "delete from account  where name = 'æå››'";// åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®çš„sqlè¯­å¥
                st = (Statement) conn.createStatement();    //åˆ›å»ºç”¨äºæ‰§è¡Œé™æ€sqlè¯­å¥çš„Statementå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œstå±å±€éƒ¨å˜é‡
                int count = st.executeUpdate(sql);// æ‰§è¡Œsqlåˆ é™¤è¯­å¥ï¼Œè¿”å›åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®çš„æ•°é‡
                System.out.println("accountè¡¨ä¸­åˆ é™¤ " + count + " æ¡æ•°æ®\n");    //è¾“å‡ºåˆ é™¤æ“ä½œçš„å¤„ç†ç»“æœ
                conn.close();   //å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
            } catch (SQLException e) {
                System.out.println("åˆ é™¤æ•°æ®å¤±è´¥");
            }

    }
}


ğŸ± 3.å›åˆ° datagrip æŸ¥çœ‹ account è¡¨çš„æ•°æ®ï¼Œå‘ç°è¡¨çš„æ•°æ®æˆåŠŸè¢«æ›´æ–°ï¼š

ğŸ° 1. MyConnectionç±»ï¼Œå®ç°æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ï¼š
Tips:åŒæ ·åˆ«å¿˜è®°å°†â€œä½ çš„å¯†ç â€æ”¹æˆä½ çš„æ•°æ®åº“å¯†ç å“¦ï¼

package JDBC_test3;

import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.SQLException;


/**
 * @author å°é»„å°é»„ä¸å†è¿·èŒ«
 * @version 1.0
 */
public class MyConnection {
    public static Connection getConnection() {
        String driver = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver";//ä½¿ç”¨JaråŒ…é©±åŠ¨
        String url = "jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/myuser?serverTimezone=UTC";//é“¾æ¥æ•°æ®åº“ç«¯å£ï¼Œæ•°æ®åº“å
        String username = "root";//æ•°æ®åº“ç”¨æˆ·å
        String password = "ä½ çš„å¯†ç ";//æ•°æ®åº“å¯†ç 
        Connection conn = null;
        try {
            Class.forName(driver); //classLoader,åŠ è½½å¯¹åº”é©±åŠ¨
            conn = (Connection) DriverManager.getConnection(url, username, password);
        } catch (ClassNotFoundException e) {//å¼‚å¸¸æ•è·
            e.printStackTrace();
        } catch (SQLException e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
        return conn;
    }

}

ğŸ¦ 2. Login ç±»ï¼Œå®ç°ç™»å½•ç•Œé¢ï¼š

package JDBC_test3;

import javax.swing.*;
import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.Statement;

/**
 1. @author å°é»„å°é»„ä¸å†è¿·èŒ«
 2. @version 1.0
 */
public class Login  extends JFrame{

    private JLabel JLname;
    private JLabel JLpwd;
    private JTextField JTname;
    private JPasswordField JTpwd;
    private JButton JBsure;
    private JButton JBexit;

    public Login(String title){
        super(title);
        JLname = new JLabel("ç”¨æˆ·åï¼š");//è®¾ç½®Labelå’ŒæŒ‰é’®å
        JLpwd = new JLabel("å¯†  ç ï¼š");
        JTname = new JTextField(20);
        JTpwd = new JPasswordField(20);
        JBsure = new JButton("ç¡®å®š");
        JBexit = new JButton("å–æ¶ˆ");

        JLname.setBounds(40, 40, 60, 25);//è®¾ç½®Labelå’ŒæŒ‰é’®å¤§å°
        JTname.setBounds(100, 40, 170, 25);
        JLpwd.setBounds(40,80,60,25);
        JTpwd.setBounds(100,80,170,25);
        JBsure.setBounds(110,130,60,25);
        JBexit.setBounds(180,130,60,25);


        this.setLayout(null);
        this.add(JLname);
        this.add(JTname);
        this.add(JLpwd);
        this.add(JTpwd);
        this.add(JBsure);
        this.add(JBexit);

        JBsure.addActionListener(new ActionListener(){//æ·»åŠ æŒ‰é’®ç›‘å¬

            public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent arg0) {
                dispose();
                loginCheak(JTname,JTpwd);
            }
        });

        JBexit.addActionListener(new ActionListener(){

            public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {

                System.exit(0);
            }

        });

    }

    public void loginCheak(JTextField tf,JPasswordField pf) {
        String username = tf.getText();
        String password = String.valueOf(pf.getPassword());
        System.out.println(password);//è¾“å‡ºå¡«å†™çš„å¯†ç 

        if("".equals(username)){//åˆ¤æ–­ç”¨æˆ·åæ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"è´¦å·ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º","Warning",JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);
            return;
        }
        if("".equals(password)){//åˆ¤æ–­å¯†ç æ˜¯å¦ä¸ºç©º
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"å¯†ç ä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©º","Warning",JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);
            return;
        }
        try{
            new MyConnection();
            Connection con = MyConnection.getConnection() ;//è°ƒç”¨MyConnection.javaä¸­çš„getConnectionæ–¹æ³•
            Statement stmt=con.createStatement();
            String sql = "select * from account where name = '" + username + "' and password = '" + password + "'"; //SQLé€‰æ‹©æŸ¥è¯¢è¯­å¥
            ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(sql);

            if (rs.next()) {
                JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this, "æˆåŠŸç™»å½•", "æç¤º",  JOptionPane.INFORMATION_MESSAGE);
                this.dispose();
            }
            else {
                JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(this, "å¸å·æˆ–å¯†ç é”™è¯¯!", "è­¦å‘Š",  JOptionPane.WARNING_MESSAGE);
                pf.requestFocus();
            }
        }catch(Exception e){
            e.printStackTrace();
        }
    }
    public static void main (String []args){//ä¸»å‡½æ•°
        Login ft=new Login("æ¬¢è¿ç™»é™†");
        ft.setSize(340, 240);
        ft.setLocation(300, 300);
        ft.setVisible(true);
        ft.setResizable(false);
    }
}

3.2 æ•ˆæœå±•ç¤º

  1. ç™»å½•ç•Œé¢å±•ç¤ºï¼Œç”¨æˆ·åå’Œå¯†ç ä¾æ¬¡è¾“å…¥ å¼ ä¸‰ã€0000ï¼š

  2. ç‚¹å‡»ç¡®å®šï¼Œæç¤ºç™»å½•æˆåŠŸï¼š

  3. é‡æ–°è¿è¡Œï¼Œè¾“å…¥å¼ ä¸‰å’Œä¸€ä¸ªé”™è¯¯å¯†ç ï¼Œæç¤ºç™»å½•å¤±è´¥ï¼š

  4. ç›´æ¥ç‚¹å‡»ç™»å½•ï¼Œæç¤ºç”¨æˆ·åä¸èƒ½ä¸ºç©ºï¼š

å†™åœ¨æœ€å

ğŸŒŸä»¥ä¸Šä¾¿æ˜¯æœ¬æ–‡çš„å…¨éƒ¨å†…å®¹å•¦ï¼Œåç»­å†…å®¹å°†ä¼šæŒç»­å…è´¹æ›´æ–°ï¼Œå¦‚æœæ–‡ç« å¯¹ä½ æœ‰æ‰€å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œéº»çƒ¦åŠ¨åŠ¨å°æ‰‹ç‚¹ä¸ªèµ + å…³æ³¨ï¼Œéå¸¸æ„Ÿè°¢ â¤ï¸ â¤ï¸ â¤ï¸ !
å¦‚æœæœ‰é—®é¢˜ï¼Œæ¬¢è¿ç§ä¿¡æˆ–è€…è¯„è®ºåŒºï¼

å…±å‹‰ï¼šâ€œä½ é—´æ­‡æ€§çš„åŠªåŠ›å’Œè’™æ··è¿‡æ—¥å­ï¼Œéƒ½æ˜¯å¯¹ä¹‹å‰åŠªåŠ›çš„æ¸…é›¶ã€‚â€
